name: Computer Science Engineering
description: Focuses on software development, algorithms, and computing systems.
fullDescription: The CSE department provides strong foundations in algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and systems. Students learn modern programming, databases, cloud, and AI fundamentals.

name: Information Technology
description: Covers software, networking, and information systems.
fullDescription: IT department emphasizes practical software development, networking, and information systems with hands-on lab exposure and industry-oriented electives.

name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
description: Focuses on electronics, signal processing, and communication systems.
fullDescription: ECE trains students in circuits, embedded systems, signal processing and communication technologies with laboratory practice and project work.

name: Mechanical Engineering
fullDescription: Mechanical department deals with machine design, thermodynamics, manufacturing processes and CAD/CAE tools to prepare students for core engineering roles.

name: Civil Engineering
fullDescription: Civil department covers structural engineering, construction management, geotechnical engineering, and surveying with practical site visits and labs.

name: Master of Business Administration
description: Focuses on management, finance and marketing.
fullDescription: MBA program prepares students with management fundamentals, leadership, finance, marketing and entrepreneurship through case studies and internships.
